Entries.NPC.cs.4001: I found that fruit growing wild! Can you believe it?$h#$b#I wanted you to have it to show how much I appreciate you.$l#$b#I'm sure you remember that when we met, it hadn't been very long since I left everything I knew to pursue a dream I wasn't sure would work out.$u#$b#My life was in this precarious, transitional state... I guess it was the same for you, back then.$u#$b#Add to that putting my art out into the world, exposing something so personal to others' interpretation and judgment... $s#$b#Of course, it all turned out well. But your support through that time meant a lot to me. *You* mean a lot to me.#$b#What I really want to say is... I love you, @. My life is richer for sharing it with you.$l

Entries.Good_4: I love the natural aromas of the farm.
Entries.spring_1: I'm glad it's spring. Some of my favorite ingredients only grow wild this time of year.#$e#I'm thinking dandelion-salmonberry salad topped with crumbled goat cheese... Mmm.
